attributes.review: i am a 45 year old mexican women and every time i say no hablo english it gets angry i’ve tried exiting out of the app but no matter how many times i tell it i’m angry it doesn’t work, it took 16 days to download this app. and i just wanted to see why everyone was talking about this orange man, the app crashed my phone and caused the song “never gonna give you up” play on my phone over and over and over again, i asked my kid why this was happening and he began to laugh at me telling me i got “rick rolled” i started googling as fast as i could but found out it was a prank. not only did this app prank me but it is racist towards me and it also made my phone bug and sent all my information to the china government.
attributes.title: this app makes me very angry

attributes.review: Wow I love our president trump just the way he loves little girls.anyways I download this app and it would stop glitching and freezing like wth 😾very angry and upset FIX IT NOW IM TAKING MY BUSINESS ELSA WHERE
